scripts.version:patch: cd projects/sanna-ui && node -e "const pkg=JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('package.json')); const v=pkg.version.split('.'); v[2]=parseInt(v[2])+1; pkg.version=v.join('.'); require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2)+'\n'); console.log('Version updated to:',pkg.version);"
scripts.version:minor: cd projects/sanna-ui && node -e "const pkg=JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('package.json')); const v=pkg.version.split('.'); v[1]=parseInt(v[1])+1; v[2]=0; pkg.version=v.join('.'); require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2)+'\n'); console.log('Version updated to:',pkg.version);"
scripts.version:major: cd projects/sanna-ui && node -e "const pkg=JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('package.json')); const v=pkg.version.split('.'); v[0]=parseInt(v[0])+1; v[1]=0; v[2]=0; pkg.version=v.join('.'); require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2)+'\n'); console.log('Version updated to:',pkg.version);"
scripts.build:lib:versioned: npm run version:patch && npm run build:lib:prod
